Class nsjava.NsPg 

java.lang.Object
   |
   +----nsjava.NsDb
           |
           +----nsjava.NsPg
public class NsPg
extends NsDb

NsPg extends the basic NsDb class to provide postgresql specific driver functionality.

See Also:
NsDb, NsLog, NsSet, NsTcl

Create a postgresql specific database handle.

Create a postgresql specific database handle.
